name: Sea Clay and Avocado facial bar take 2
description:
This is a PRE ORDER!  This soap will NOT ship out immediately due  to the fact it still needs time to cure before hitting the mail.  Will ship out on 11/15/12 but needs til the 20th to fully cure.


This is the exact same recipe as my original facial bar, with the exception of the scent is crisp green apple...oh my.

This skin loving facial bar is WONDERFUL!  I made it with sea clay, avocado, coconut, jojoba and olive oils and added Shea and cocoa butter for that extra moisturizing oomph.

name: Peaches and Cream
description:
This is a PRE ORDER!  This soap will NOT ship out immediately due  to the fact it still needs time to cure before hitting the mail.  Will ship out on 11/15/12 but needs til the 20th to fully cure.

Yeah, baby.  I am a peach fan no matter what it is in.  This smells VERY light, but the soap is actually one of my best for some reason.  The lather is ridiculous, and leaves your skin super soft...I may have accidentally  dumped some extra shea butter in this one.  I also have the lotion for this, and let me tell you....this is the one I have been using the past week before I go to bed, and my bed smell so GOOD lol.  LOVE that!  One of my faves.  Jump right up the list when at first, I was like 'eh' about it.

name: Kumquat
description:
This is a PRE ORDER!  This soap will NOT ship out immediately due  to the fact it still needs time to cure before hitting the mail.  Will ship out on 11/15/12 but needs til the 20th to fully cure.

OMGOODNESS this smell so delicious...very sweet and fruity.  Hate the name, love the scent and look of this.  Kids seem to love this one...

name: Destiny
description:
This is a PRE ORDER!  This soap will NOT ship out immediately due  to the fact it still needs time to cure before hitting the mail.  Will ship out on 11/15/12 but needs til the 20th to fully cure.


This is a dupe of the famous LUSH brand's best seller, 'Karma'.  This smells like patchouli to me...maybe a little sandalwood.  Total head shop smell, incense...I can see why it sells out so fast.
